description: This file initializes the React application by rendering the main App component into the DOM element with id 'root'. It imports React, ReactDOM, a CSS stylesheet, and the App component, then creates a root for rendering and mounts the App within React.StrictMode.

methods.name: ReactDOM.createRoot
methods.description: Creates a root to enable React to render components into the DOM element.

methods.name: root.render
methods.description: Renders React components into the created root, in this case rendering the App component within React.StrictMode.
